dashboard.subtitle: Unified documentation hub for your projects
dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.createFirstProject: Create your first project to get started

sync.dialogDescription: Choose how to sync the repository.
sync.infoMessage: Documents are automatically chunked during sync. Enable embedding to generate vectors for AI semantic search.
sync.fullScanDescription: Scan all documents from the latest commit. Most thorough but takes longer.
sync.incrementalDescription: Process only changed documents since last sync. Fast and efficient.
sync.specificCommitDescription: Get documents from a specific commit. Useful for restoring past versions.
sync.syncTooltip: Sync documents and generate embeddings for semantic search

credentials.title: Git Credentials
credentials.description: Manage personal authentication credentials for accessing private Git repositories

ragConfig.title: RAG Settings
ragConfig.description: Configure embedding, vector search, and hybrid search settings for this project
ragConfig.embeddingChangeWarning: Changing the embedding model will require re-embedding all documents. This may take some time.

embedding.title: Embedding Model
embedding.description: Configure the embedding model for document vectorization
embedding.providerOpenaiHint: Uses OpenAI API. Requires API key configuration.
embedding.providerOllamaHint: Uses local Ollama server. No API costs.

pgvector.title: Vector Search (PgVector)
pgvector.similarityThresholdHint: Minimum similarity score (0.0 - 1.0). Higher values return more relevant results.

neo4j.title: Graph RAG (Neo4j)
neo4j.description: Configure knowledge graph-based search using Neo4j
neo4j.maxHopHint: Maximum graph traversal depth. Higher values explore more relationships but may be slower.
neo4j.extractionModelHint: LLM model used for extracting entities and relationships from documents
neo4j.graphRagDescription: Graph RAG extracts entities and relationships from your documents to build a knowledge graph. This enables semantic search that understands connections between concepts.

hybrid.title: Hybrid Search
hybrid.description: Configure how vector and graph search results are combined
hybrid.rrfDescription: Combines rankings using reciprocal rank fusion. Good for most use cases.
hybrid.weightedSumDescription: Combines scores using weighted sum. Allows fine-tuning the balance.
hybrid.rrfKHint: Ranking constant (default: 60). Lower values give more weight to top results.

reEmbed.title: Re-embed Documents
reEmbed.description: Regenerate embeddings for all documents in this project
reEmbed.warning: This will delete all existing embeddings and regenerate them with the new model. This process cannot be undone.
reEmbed.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to re-embed all documents?

openai_api_key.title: OpenAI API Key
openai_api_key.summary: Used for generating embeddings in semantic search.

anthropic_api_key.title: Anthropic API Key
anthropic_api_key.summary: Required for LLM Chat functionality using Claude AI.

neo4j_auth.title: Neo4j Authentication
neo4j_auth.summary: Required for Neo4j database connection for Graph RAG.

pgvector_auth.title: PgVector Authentication
pgvector_auth.summary: Required for PostgreSQL (pgvector) connection for vector search.

welcome.title: Welcome to Docst!
welcome.description: Manage distributed documentation in one place and experience AI-powered search.

step1.title: 1. Set up credentials
step1.description: Register your GitHub PAT to access private repositories.

step2.title: 2. Create a project
step2.description: Create a project and connect your Git repositories.

step3.title: 3. Sync documents
step3.description: Sync repositories to automatically index your documents.

credentials.title: System Credentials
credentials.description: System-wide authentication credentials for external services (OpenAI, Neo4j, etc.)
credentials.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this credential?
credentials.name: Name
credentials.nameCannotChange: Name cannot be changed after creation
credentials.typeCannotChange: Type cannot be changed after creation
credentials.neo4jFormat: Format: JSON with username and password fields

neo4j.title: Neo4j Configuration
neo4j.subtitle: Graph database settings for knowledge graph RAG
neo4j.credentialNote: Neo4j credentials must be configured in the Credentials tab with type NEO4J_AUTH
